column9:
Thank you for your email. Please note that I am out of the winery from Friday 10th July. returning Monday 27th July 2009. If you require anything during this time. please forward your email to info@maxwellwines.com.au. or phone the winery direct on +61 8 8323 8200.

Paul Harvey
Marketing Manager

Maxwell Wines
30th Anniversary 1979-2009
www.maxwellwines.com.au

Winery & Vineyards: Olivers Road. McLaren Vale. South Australia 5171
Postal: PO Box 111. McLaren Vale. South Australia 5171
T: +61 8 8323 8200
F: +61 8 8323 8900
